references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, the foundation upon which FashionComposer is built.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is used for text encoding in FashionComposer, enabling text-based control over image generation.

references.paper_title: Densepose: Dense human pose estimation in the wild
references.reason: The SMPL model, detailed in this paper, provides the human body model used in FashionComposer for controlling pose and body shape.
This paper introduces Qwen, a large language model that provides text captions for training data in FashionComposer.

references.paper_title: Masked-attention mask transformer for universal image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces Mask2Former, which helps create training data by segmenting clothing items in images for FashionComposer.
